name: Spawner
description: Spawn EIP 1167 minimal proxies with an included initialization step during contract creation.
author: 0age

scripts.all: ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli --gasLimit 8000000 -i 1234 2>&1 > ganache-output.log & echo 'local chain started.' && ./node_modules/.bin/truffle compile && node scripts/test/ci.js; kill -9 "$(ps -ax | grep -m1 '[n]ode ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli' | awk '{print $1;}')" && echo 'local chain stopped.'
scripts.ci: ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli --gasLimit 8000000 -q & echo 'local chain started.' && ./node_modules/.bin/truffle compile && node scripts/test/ci.js
scripts.stop: kill -9 "$(ps -ax | grep -m1 '[n]ode ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli' | awk '{print $1;}')" && echo 'local chain stopped.'
